title: Alfheim Seoul
description:
Alecia was a spirited Korean-American girl living in Seattle, navigating high school, and learning to drive until a fearsome creature from Alfheim came along and ate her soul.           ...well half of it anyway.

 



I steeled myself and raised the knife to strike."Wait," I said. "I don't even know your name. I kinda feel like I need to know your name before I kill you.""You can call me Iverog," he said.
author: Chris  Coleman
